1.title: Shaina & Rajveer's story
1.plot: Shaina, the successful and arrogant vice-president of a cosmetics company, falls in love with Rajveer, a junior colleague, after he saves her from a bunch of goons. Shaina and Rajveer have a physical relationship. Then, Rajveer's wife tells Shaina that she knows of the affair. What are Rajveer's intentions?

2.title: Raj & Mahi's murderous love
2.plot: Cousins Raj and Mahi are in love with each other. But Mahi is afraid of Anuj and Manoj, her brothers. When they take off on a trip, Raj and Mahi get intimate. Later, on knowing the truth, Manoj beats up Mahi. But Manoj is unable to foresee her terrifying reaction.

3.title: An employer, a maid and blackmail
3.plot: Nanda, a domestic help falls in love with her married employer Siddharth, not heeding her friend's warning. She is lured to get intimate with Siddharth. Anil, the cook, discovers the affair and blackmails her. Siddharth refuses to marry Nanda. What extreme measures will Nanda take now?

4.title: Man pushes wife into prostitution
4.plot: Due to huge gambling losses, Devendra forces his wife Mihita to get intimate with Nilesh, who pushes her into prostitution. Angered by Devendra, Mihita withdraws all money from the joint account. Soon, an accident results in Devendra being confined to bed.

5.title: A powerful man, a scorned wife
5.plot: Thirteen years after eloping, Vikrant, now a successful politician, ignores Ragini, his wife. Ragini soon discovers her husband's affair with Richa. Vikrant informs Ragini of his intention to get a divorce. Even as Vikrant is appointed Chief Minister, he has to pay the price for his disloyalty to his wife.

6.title: Kavita's revenge
6.plot: Sonia's parents, Ashok and Kavita are separated. Sonia lives with her father. When Sonia becomes depressed and attempts suicide, Randhir, her step-father protects her by bashing up Neel, her step-brother, for attempted molestation.

7.title: A romance, incest and murder
7.plot: Romi and Suchit are in love and he is very possessive of her. Romi confesses to Suchit that her elderly uncle forced her to have an illicit relationship with him. The uncle makes his will, leaving assets to Romi. Suchit shoots the uncle and Romi calls the police. Will there be more killing before the law takes its course?

8.title: A romance, incest and murder
8.plot: Romi and Suchit are in love and he is very possessive of her. Romi confesses to Suchit that her elderly uncle forced her to have an illicit relationship with him. The uncle makes his will, leaving assets to Romi. Suchit shoots the uncle and Romi calls the police. Will there be more killing before the law takes its course?

9.title: The greed of a woman
9.plot: The Inspector General puts Inspector Ranvijay on the trail of Dilip, who manages the illegal activities of a powerful minister. Dilip, the womanizer, meets and falls in love with Rashmi and reveals to her the source of his income. When Inspector Ranvijay arrives on the scene, one of them is dead, and the other is missing.

10.title: Meethi Supari
10.plot: Samar's girlfriend lover, Gayatri leaves him to marry his best friend Sid. Samar tries to do suicide frequently but luck is in his favoour. His parsi neighbour, Pastakia tries to cheer him up but finally he gives himself a supari to a contract killer to kill himself. But Samar falls in love with his contract killer, a sensual beauty Tara. She tries to kill him but she gets hit by a car. Samar takes her to the hospital. Both falls in love but main contract killer boss wants to kill both. They flee from city to survive and start a new life.

11.title: Fatal Attraction
11.plot: Superstar Aryan's wife Taniya leaves him because of his workaholic schedule. A lonely Aryan befriends Urvashi. But Urvashi's obsessive love for Aryan leads to murder and attempted suicide. When Aryan refuses to meet her, she escapes from the hospital. How will Urvashi's mad love story end?

12.title: Doctor or murderer?
12.plot: Priya admits her alcoholic husband Akhil to a sanatorium where Dr. Kartik is attracted to her. On a rainy day, the doctor offers to drop Priya home. This leads to an intimate affair between the two. Later, Akhil dies and Dr. Kartik is accused of murder by Akhil's mother. What is the truth?

13.title: Greed, murder and the other woman
13.plot: Rudra plans to kill his wealthy wife Neena and take over her property. Sabrina, Rudra's girlfriend befriends Neena and influences her to kill Rudra. Sabrina tampers with the brakes of his car. The plan works, but then Rudra, presumed dead, tries to kill Neena. He and Sabrina start a new life, but is Neena really dead?

-1.title: A sad marriage, a tragic affair
-1.plot: Devika is married to Avishek but ignored by her husband and lonely. She seeks solace in a neighbor, Prashant. The friendship becomes an extramarital affair and Avishek gets wind of it. Cornered, Devika opts to elope with Prashant. But then both the men in her life let her down and Devika has only one way out.

imdb.title: Ishq Kills
plot: Love in its darkest form can lead to crimes of obsession and passion. Love, sin & retribution around forbidden relationships. 26 episodes inspired by True Stories.::Anonymous
